parsetree.*:
<root><template><title>RV</title><part><name>type</name>=<value>command

</value></part><part><name index="1"/><value> arma2

</value></part><part><name>gr1</name>=<value> Briefing

</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>1.00

</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> Send a result of the task to the task sender.

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> [[<template><title>PAGENAME</title></template>]] task

</value></part><part><name>p1</name>=<value> task: [[Task]]

</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[Array]] -  [state, result] (see [[setTaskResult]])

</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code>[[taskResult]] ([[player]] [[createSimpleTask]] ["NewTask"]);</code>

</value></part><part><name>seealso</name>=<value> [[setTaskResult]]
</value></part></template>


<template lineStart="1"><title>GameCategory</title><part><name index="1"/><value>arma2</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>Scripting Commands</value></part></template>
